com.whaleal.mars.core.aggregation.expressions

类 DateExpressions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.whaleal.mars.core.aggregation.expressions.DateExpressions

  • public final class DateExpressions
extends Object
    Defines helper methods for the date expressions

      Base class for the date expressions

      Constructs and returns a Date object given the date’s constituent properties.
      static DateToString dateToString()
      Returns the date as a formatted string.
      static DateExpressions.DateExpression dayOfMonth(Expression value)
      Returns the day of the month for a date as a number between 1 and 31.

      Returns the day of the week for a date as a number between 1 (Sunday) and 7 (Saturday).

      Returns the hour for a date as a number between 0 and 23.

      Returns the weekday number in ISO 8601 format, ranging from 1 (for Monday) to 7 (for Sunday).

      Returns the year number in ISO 8601 format.

      Returns the milliseconds of a date as a number between 0 and 999.

      Returns the minute for a date as a number between 0 and 59.

      Returns the month for a date as a number between 1 (January) and 12 (December).

      Returns the seconds for a date as a number between 0 and 60 (leap seconds).

      Converts a value to a date.
      static DateExpressions.DateExpression week(Expression value)
      Returns the week number for a date as a number between 0 (the partial week that precedes the first Sunday of the year) and 53 (leap year).
      static DateExpressions.DateExpression year(Expression value)
      Returns the year for a date as a number (e.g. 2014).

        返回:
        the new expression $dateFromParts

        Converts a date/time string to a date object.
        返回:
        the new expression $dateFromString

      • dateToParts

        public static DateToParts dateToParts(Expression date)
        Constructs and returns a Date object given the date’s constituent properties.
        参数:
        date - The input date for which to return parts.
        返回:
        the new expression $dateToParts

      • dateToString

        public static DateToString dateToString()
        Returns the date as a formatted string.
        返回:
        the new expression $dateToString

      • dayOfMonth

        public static DateExpressions.DateExpression dayOfMonth(Expression value)
        Returns the day of the month for a date as a number between 1 and 31.
        参数:
        value - the expression containing the date value
        返回:
        the new expression $dayOfMonth

      • dayOfWeek

        public static DateExpressions.DateExpression dayOfWeek(Expression value)
        Returns the day of the week for a date as a number between 1 (Sunday) and 7 (Saturday).
        参数:
        value - the expression containing the date value
        返回:
        the new expression $dayOfWeek

      • dayOfYear

        public static DateExpressions.DateExpression dayOfYear(Expression value)
        Returns the day of the year for a date as a number between 1 and 366 (leap year).
        参数:
        value - the expression containing the date value
        返回:
        the new expression $dayOfYear

      • hour

        public static DateExpressions.DateExpression hour(Expression value)
        Returns the hour for a date as a number between 0 and 23.
        参数:

        返回:
        the new expression $hour

      • isoDayOfWeek

        public static IsoDates isoDayOfWeek(Expression value)
        Returns the weekday number in ISO 8601 format, ranging from 1 (for Monday) to 7 (for Sunday).
        参数:
        value - the expression containing the date value
        返回:
        the new expression $isoDayOfWeek

      • isoWeek

        public static IsoDates isoWeek(Expression value)
        Returns the week number in ISO 8601 format, ranging from 1 to 53. Week numbers start at 1 with the week (Monday through Sunday) that contains the year’s first Thursday.
        参数:
        value - the expression containing the date value
        返回:
        the new expression $isoWeek

      • isoWeekYear

        public static IsoDates isoWeekYear(Expression value)
        Returns the year number in ISO 8601 format. The year starts with the Monday of week 1 (ISO 8601) and ends with the Sunday of the last week (ISO 8601).
        参数:
        value - the expression containing the date value
        返回:
        the new expression $isoWeekYear

      • milliseconds

        public static DateExpressions.DateExpression milliseconds(Expression value)
        Returns the milliseconds of a date as a number between 0 and 999.
        参数:
        value - the expression containing the date value
        返回:
        the new expression $millisecond

      • minute

        public static DateExpressions.DateExpression minute(Expression value)
        Returns the minute for a date as a number between 0 and 59.
        参数:
        value - the expression containing the date value
        返回:
        the new expression $minute

      • month

        public static DateExpressions.DateExpression month(Expression value)
        Returns the month for a date as a number between 1 (January) and 12 (December).
        参数:
        value - the expression containing the date value
        返回:
        the new expression $month

      • second

        public static DateExpressions.DateExpression second(Expression value)
        Returns the seconds for a date as a number between 0 and 60 (leap seconds).
        参数:
        value - the expression containing the date value
        返回:
        the new expression $second

      • toDate

        public static DateExpressions.DateExpression toDate(Expression value)
        Converts a value to a date. If the value cannot be converted to a date, $toDate errors. If the value is null or missing, $toDate returns null.
        参数:
        value - the expression containing the date value
        返回:
        the new expression $toDate

      • week

        public static DateExpressions.DateExpression week(Expression value)
        Returns the week number for a date as a number between 0 (the partial week that precedes the first Sunday of the year) and 53 (leap year).
        参数:
        value - the expression containing the date value
        返回:
        the new expression $week

      • year

        public static DateExpressions.DateExpression year(Expression value)
        Returns the year for a date as a number (e.g. 2014).
        参数:
        value - the expression containing the date value
        返回:
        the new expression $year
